resources.string:
Welcome to VibeSense, a mood tracking and analysis application designed to help you understand and improve your emotional well-being. By using our services, you agree to the following terms and conditions:
 
You are solely responsible for the accuracy and completeness of the information you input into the app, and you acknowledge that VibeSense is not a substitute for professional medical advice or treatment.
 
We may use your data to improve our services, but we will never share your personal information with third parties without your explicit consent. We reserve the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time, and your continued use of VibeSense constitutes your acceptance of any such changes.
 
If you violate these terms or any applicable laws, we may terminate your account without notice. By using VibeSense, you agree to indemnify and hold us harmless from any claims, damages, or losses arising out of your use of the app.
